review_title: Poor video quality and poor cuts
one_reviews_text: Most content that i've tried to see was in poor video quality and had lots of jump cuts in them or shaking cameras which made me nauseous.
The developers need to wait until they actually have content to publish and a solid VR user experience. This feels rushed and amature.

review_title: Did anyone check this app before publish
one_reviews_text: Language is half spanish, half english. Right controller does not work. signup and login is messed up and almost impossible. And these guys have a F1 license for content...??
Seems to be all in spanish?  This should be in the description to set expectations.
Rich Catalonians showing their "incredible" lifestyle. Supremacist rubbish.
